DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) could reduce pain cannulation vein .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation Pain During Venous Cannulation
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred patient allocate randomly two group : In active TENS group TENS deliver via two electrode venous cannulation site ( radial side wrist dominant forearm ) 20 min prior venous cannulation control group receive placebo ( current ) TENS . Venous cannulation 22 gage cannula perform . During venous cannulation pain intensity ( 0 = pain , 10 = worst pain imaginable ) measure . Any side effect study period record
DOC.criteria: outpatient underwent plastic surgery concomitant sedative analgesic medication , neurological disease . patient potentially dangerous internal disease ( American Society Anesthesiologists ' physical status > 3 ) .
